## ğŸ“‹ Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation

### Testing
- [ ] I have tested all tabs of the Shiny app
- [ ] All models train successfully
- [ ] Visualizations render correctly
- [ ] No errors in R console
- [ ] Tested on multiple browsers (if UI changes)

### Git
- [ ] My commits are properly formatted
- [ ] I have rebased on the latest main branch
- [ ] I have resolved any merge conflicts
